author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Nicki Minaj wears body chain around her booty in Miami | Daily Mail Online
text: Share She accessorized with a see-through red visa and a little red choker necklace. The pair looked to be getting close as Minaj was seen twerking on him and dancing around him. Minaj certainly wasn't shy as she was seen getting into all kinds of positions, showing off her voluptuous figure Curvy: The 34-year-old wore an all red outfit that exposed every inch of her curvaceous body Wow: The rapper, whose legal name is Onika Tanya Maraj, paired the skimpy outfit with color-coordinated, lace-up kinky boots with an open toe Collaboration: Nicki was joined on the set by the rapper Future This isn't the first time the 10-time Grammy nominee has worked with Future. The duo previously collaborated on DJ Khaled’s Do You Mind and the Rich Gang single Tapout. They have been working hard together but it looks as though Minaj and Future are also lending their talents elsewhere. More than once: This isn't the first time the 10-time Grammy nominee has worked with Future Good duo: The pair previously collaborated on DJ Khaled’s Do You Mind and the Rich Gang single Tapout Other artists: Minaj has lent her voice to some tracks by Jason Derulo, Gucci Mane and Major Lazer in recent weeks According to XXL Minaj has lent her voice to some tracks by Jason Derulo, Gucci Mane and Major Lazer in recent weeks. Meanwhile Future just appeared in Ariana Grande’s video for Everyday. Solo, he has released videos for Draco and Super Trapper recently, as well as appearing alongside Belly in his video for Frozen Water.
